channel.title: Pk Planet client help ( changing ip of client )
channel.description: can someone explain to me or do it for me on Team viewer on how I can make the pk planet client be able to connect to friends and stuff. I got the client on my other comp and tryed joining my own server to test it, but it said error connecting to server or some stuff like that. I went to client.java and changed the ip to my hamachi.. then i went to GUI.java and did the same i exited and closed. what am i doing wrong. and if compiling is the problem can someone tell me why my thing says i do not have java?? when i have jdk 22

item.title: Pk Planet client help ( changing ip of client )
item.dc:creator: @runyluny runyluny
item.description:
@runyluny wrote:

i already did. I saw a video on youtube for it and it still dont work… if aomeone had Team viewer that wud be helpful

item.title: Pk Planet client help ( changing ip of client )
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Your friends need to have hamachi and they need to connect to your Hamachi ip before they can connect to your client. aka server
